resources.string: This application needs camera permission (to be able to evaluate yor emotion).\nPlease navigate to: Phone Settings/Apps/ZestTest/Permissions and enable camera access.
This application needs camera permission (to be able to evaluate yor emotion). If you deny it the application cannot work.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
Time out waiting to lock camera opening.
Interrupted while trying to lock camera opening.
Interrupted while trying to lock camera closing.
API key not accessible on this device.
Cannot access camera, may be used by another application.
